bookTitle: Remembrance of Things Past: Volume I - Swann's Way & Within a Budding Grove
bookAuthors: Marcel Proust, C.K. Scott Moncrieff, Terence Kilmartin
Plot: 'The transmutation of sensation into sentiment, the ebb tide of memory, waves of emotion such as desire, jealousy, and artistic euphoria — this is the material of this enormous and yet singularly light and translucid work' — Vladimir Nabokov Originally rendered by C.K. Scott Moncrieff from an early and unreliable French edition, Proust’s masterpiece has now been flawlessly translated by Terence Kilmartin in this acclaimed version.
